overview:
Gabriel is a Marketing professional focused on IT products and services.

Following his studies at the BCUC in London, he founded his own company in 1996 to pioneer Web solutions, launching some of the first on-line shops, an on-line lottery in Australia, community sites, an on-line Model Agency in Belgium, Workflow and Retail/FMCG CMS solutions in France. His company partnered with NeXT to promote its WebObjects platform. Following the merger of Apple and NeXT, he became Sales Executive at Apple’s Hungarian IMC in 2002, later serving as CTO until 2008. Before joining Scarab Research, he was Head of Marketing at Escalion, an online payment processing company.
